meta.title: Golden Sweet | Dietary Pastry in Tetouan & Tangier
meta.description: Golden Sweet creates artisan plant-based cinnamon rolls and pastries in Tetouan & Tangier. Order your 100% homemade treats, available 24/7.

promo.banner: FOR A LIMITED TIME · FREE DELIVERY TO TANGIER FROM 500 DHs

home.hero_title: Artisan treats, day and night in Tetouan & Tangier
home.hero_description: Our soft rolls, golden cannelés and creamy drinks are handcrafted and delivered warm, even at 3 AM.
home.value1_desc: Organic flours, raw sugars and plant-based butters create recipes that are as delicious as they are responsible.
home.value2_desc: Kneaded, rolled and glazed by hand, our products come fresh from the oven multiple times a day.
home.value3_desc: Our flavors follow Moroccan harvests: Azemmour pistachios, Souss amlou, locally roasted coffee.
home.value4_desc: Quality, traceability and support for local artisans: every roll funds community initiatives.
home.story_heading: From family kitchen to the north's favorite sweet spot
home.story_intro: Chef Aziza created Golden Sweet to offer 100% plant-based cinnamon rolls to loved ones. Orders multiplied quickly, then night deliveries, until we opened our workshop in Tetouan.
home.timeline_2019_desc: One box, six soft rolls and word-of-mouth that spread across Tetouan in weeks.
home.timeline_2021_desc: Installation of our plant-based lab and launch of pistachio, amlou and Moroccan coffee flavors.
home.timeline_2022_desc: 24/7 production to satisfy hotels, cafés and late-night neighbors.
home.timeline_2024_desc: Arrival of cannelés, pastéis de nata and colorful lattes to complement our iconic rolls.
home.provenance_desc: Every roll starts with responsible sourcing. We select our nuts, coffees and aromatic plants from producers who share our plant-based vision.
home.chef_heading: Meet Chef Aziza, creator of Golden Sweet rolls
home.chef_desc: Self-taught and passionate, Chef Aziza reimagines childhood pastries in plant-based versions. She works soft textures, pistachio, amlou and Moroccan coffee flavors for generous rolls.
home.chef_technique: Signature technique: slow dough rise for incomparable softness.
home.chef_ingredient: Signature ingredient: homemade amlou with vegan honey, roasted weekly.
home.chef_commitment: Commitment: training young pastry chefs in plant-based recipes.
home.events_form_note: Two emails per month, recipes and zero spam.
home.community_desc: Every day, our gourmet circle grows: terrace brunches, midnight deliveries, impromptu workshops. Join the creators who make Golden Sweet shine throughout the north.
home.press_heading: They've tasted and approved our rolls
home.special_party_desc: Choose a seasonal flavor, botanical glaze and we'll create a custom centerpiece.
home.special_wholesale_desc: Our dietary pastries complement cafés, hotels and concept stores with 24/7 deliveries.
home.cta_desc: Browse our full collection of rolls, cannelés, pastéis and homemade drinks.
home.newsletter_heading: Receive our seasonal menus and night offers

footer.credit: Created with love by Golden Sweet

products.classic_desc: Soft dough, Ceylon cinnamon and almond milk vanilla glaze.
products.chocolate_desc: Double chocolate glaze, roasted hazelnuts and vegan caramel, perfect for brunch.
products.caramel_desc: Amlou caramel, crunchy pecans and melting cinnamon center.
products.pistachio_desc: Homemade pistachio cream, roasted almonds and matcha glaze for a fresh touch.
products.pasteis_desc: Vanilla custard, flaky pastry and caramelized muscovado sugar.
products.canneles_desc: Soft vanilla center, caramelized shell and a touch of orange blossom.
products.box_desc: A ready-to-share assortment of our iconic rolls: vanilla, caramel, chocolate, raspberry and pistachio.
products.raspberry_desc: Light vanilla cream, raspberry coulis and pink glaze on a soft roll.
products.coffee_desc: Mocha glaze with Guéliz coffee beans, blond caramel and orange blossom touch.
